snippet: The deal, which gives American Airlines and British Airways a hub in Doha, is the latest in a flurry of airline partnerships in recent months.
abstract: American Airlines and British Airways say Qatar Airways will join their Oneworld alliance, giving them access to hub in Doha.
lead_paragraph: The deal, which gives American Airlines and British Airways a hub in Doha, is the latest in a flurry of airline partnerships in recent months.

headline.main: Qatar Airways Is Latest in Middle East to Join Alliance
headline.print_headline: Qatar Airways Is Latest in Middle East to Join Alliance
